title: The Best Smart Light Under 2k !
description: For the past few days, Ive been wondering, how I could automate the lights in my own house. This video explains tha  Buy TP-Link HS100 -  (currently on sale)  You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use?
